I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Malingatu tu a micudad! cumudsa ku pasevana’ay, suwal satu ku pangcang, “katemireng! micemek!”
It’s time for class , the teacher walked into the classroom, and the monitor said, “Stand up! Salute!”
我今天七點到學校。: 開始上課了!老師剛走進教室時，班長說:「起立!敬禮!」

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Tataang ku nipangiha niyam, “Kapah haw kisu pasevana’ay?”
We said loudly, “Hi, teacher.”
我今天七點到學校。: 我們大聲的說:「老師好。」

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: I nipicudad, pasevana’an nu pasevana’ay kami tu sasausian nu Pangcah a suwal.
In class, the teacher taught us the Pangcah language of numbers.
我今天七點到學校。: 上課的時候，老師教我們數字的阿美族語。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Duduen niyam ku pasevana’ay a remadiw tu sapisa’usi a radiw.
We followed the teacher to read, we sang the number song.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們跟著老師唸，我們唱了數字歌。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Adihay tu ku nikavana’an nu maku tu suwal nu Pangcah.
I have learned many Pangcah languages.
我今天七點到學校。: 我學會好多族語。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: A patengil kaku ci inaan tu nipinanam tu suwal nu Pangcah i cacudadan tu remiremiad.
I go to school every day, I learn the Pangcah language every day, and I want to tell my mother.
我今天七點到學校。: 我天天上學，我天天學族語，我要講給媽媽聽。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Ci Kacaw ku ngangan nu maku.
My name is kacaw.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的名字是kacaw。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Ci Using ku ngangan ni ama nu maku.
My dad’s name is Using.
我今天七點到學校。: 我爸爸的名字是Using。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Ci Panay ku ngangan ni ina nu maku.
My mother’s name is Panay.
我今天七點到學校。: 我媽媽的名字是Panay。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Muktep tu ku mihcaan nu maku i anini a mihca.
I am 10 years old.
我今天七點到學校。: 我今年10歲。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Sikaka kaku tu vavainay cacay, ci Kulas han cira, savaw tu cacay ku mihcaan nira i anini a mihca.
I have a brother, his name is kulas, he is 11 years old.
我今天七點到學校。: 我有一個哥哥，他叫Kulas，他今年11歲。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Malecad ku cacudadan niyam.
We study in the same school.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們在同一間學校讀書。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Maulah kami malekaka a remidiw.
Both my brother and I like to sing.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和哥哥都喜歡唱歌。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Maulah kaku a midanguy, i pipantangan maruyaruy tu ku luma’ niyam a midanguy.
I like swimming. During the holidays, our whole family go swimming together.
我今天七點到學校。: 我喜歡游泳，放假的時候，我們全家會一起去游泳。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Maulah kaku a sicavay tu valuhay a cavay, malecavay tu kami a remadiw, a midanguy.
I love meeting new people, we can sing and swim together.
我今天七點到學校。: 我喜歡認識新朋友，我們可以一起唱歌和游泳。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: U wawa nu Pangcah kaku.
I am an ’Amis child.
我今天七點到學校。: 我是阿美族的小孩。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: I Rinahemay ku luma’ nu niyam.
Our family lives in Rinahem.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們家住在Rinahem。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: U tamdaw nu luma’ nu niyam lalima.
There are five people in our family.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們家共有五個人。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Tatulu kami a malekaka.
There are three brothers and sisters in our family.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們家有三個兄弟姊妹。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Makumud ku aru’ nu maku aci ama, ina, atu kaka tu vavainayan, kaka tu vavahiyan.
I live with my father, mother, brother and sister.
我今天七點到學校。: 我跟爸爸、媽媽、哥哥和姊姊住在一起。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Tarakaw ci ama aku, u malakincalay ci ama nu maku.
My father is tall and he is a policeman.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的爸爸很高，我的爸爸是警察。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Makupit ci ina aku, u ising ci ina nu maku.
My mother is thin and my mom is a doctor.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的媽媽很瘦，我的媽媽是醫生。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Anu i luma’ tu ci ama, u nu Pangcah tu ku nikasasuwal niyam.
My father speaks the Pangcah language with us at home.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸在家就會和我們說阿美族語。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: I pahanhan nu laludan, taluma’ tu kami i niyaru’.
We will all go back to the tribe during the summer vacation.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們暑假都會回部落。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Mahekulung kami a malekaka a milepel tu tatakula’.
My brothers and sisters and I will catch frogs together.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和兄姊會一起抓青蛙。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Maulah kaku tu tamdaw nu luma’ nu niyam.
I like our family very much.
我今天七點到學校。: 我很喜歡我們家的人。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Tahkal a mihulul kaku aci ina i anini a remiad.
I went out with my mother today.
我今天七點到學校。: 今天我和媽媽出去玩。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Salangdaw sa ku kakarayan i remiadan, carangcang aca ku remiad.
The sky is blue during the day, the weather is neither cold nor hot, and the wind is cool.
我今天七點到學校。: 白天的天空很藍，天氣也風和日麗。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Maru’ kami a kemaen tu pan i sirengusay a seraan, sadiheku saan ku tireng a mapacidal
We ate bread on the grass, the sun was shining on us, and it was very warm.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們在草地上吃著麵包，陽光灑在身上，非常溫暖。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Salahengan satu ku kakarayan i herek nu kalahukan.
In the afternoon, the sky turned red.
我今天七點到學校。: 下午，天空變紅了。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Palitaen nu maku ci ina, kiya u lahngangay saw ku kulit nu kakarayan?
I asked my mother why the sky is red.
我今天七點到學校。: 我問媽媽，為甚麼天空的顏色是紅色的？

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Suwal satu ci ina, kay a initu ku valiyus.
Mom said, maybe the typhoon is coming.
我今天七點到學校。: 媽媽說，可能是颱風要來了。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Awaay ku kutem i lavii, sadak satu ku vuis.
There were no clouds in the sky at night, and the stars came out.
我今天七點到學校。: 晚上天上沒有雲，星星出來了。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: A taluma’ tu kita.
We were going home too.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們也要回家了。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: I vatad tu sakataluma’ a lalanan, milunguc kaku tu vuis.
On the way home, I made a wish with the stars,
我今天七點到學校。: 在回家的路上，我跟星星許願。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Akaa katayni ku valiyus nasa kaku, a managlay hen kaku a mihulul kiyami.
I hope the typhoon doesn't come, I still want to go out to play again.
我今天七點到學校。: 希望颱風不要來!我還想再出去玩。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: I tapiingan nu luma’ ku cacudadan niyam, rakaten nu maku a talacacudadan, rakaten aca a taluma’ tu remiremiad.
My school is next to our house, I walk to school every day, and I also walk home.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的學校在我們家旁邊，我天天走路去學校，也走路回家。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Caay katataang ku cacudadan nu niyam, caay kaaluman ku micudaday, u masasuvana’ tu amin kami.
Our school is not big, there are not many students, everyone knows each other.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們學校不大，沒有很多學生，大家互相認識。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Malecapu amin ku adiwawa i kavekacan a mimali, a masasuwasuwal.
All the children will gather in the playground, play ball and chat together.
我今天七點到學校。: 所有小朋友會聚在操場，一起玩球、一起聊天。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Mikihatiya ku pasevana’ay i tamiyan a mahekulung a malehulul, matiya sa u malecacayay a luma’an ku cacudadan.
The teachers also play with us, the school is one big family.
我今天七點到學校。: 老師們也會和我們一起玩，學校是個大家庭。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Miasik kami tu remiremiad, satamelac han niyam ku nipiasik tu picudadan.
We have to clean every day, and everyone has to clean the classroom.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們每天都要打掃，大家要把教室打掃乾淨。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Simisipuay tu sasingaran, simiasikay nu rumaan a tamdaw.
Some people clean the windows, some sweep the floor.
我今天七點到學校。: 有些人去擦窗戶，另外,有些人去掃地。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Miasik aca kami tu karimucumucuan nu cacudadan, matatahic kami a malalikel a demak, satamelac satu ku cacudadan tu remiremiad.
We will also clean every corner of the school. Everyone works together, and the school is very clean every day.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們還會打掃學校的各個角落，大家分工合作，學校每天都很乾淨。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Natayra kaku i niyaru’ a milisu’ ci vakian i nacila.
Yesterday, I went to visit my grandpa in the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 昨天，我去部落拜訪爺爺。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Matenesay tu kami a caay kasasuaraw, maurun tu kaku i ciraan.
We haven’t seen each other for a long time and I miss him a lot.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們很久沒有見面了，我很想念他。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Melaw saan ci vaki i takuwan, pakaenan kaku tu ciyak, pananuman aca kaku tu ociya.
As soon as grandpa saw me, he invited me to eat watermelon and drink tea.
我今天七點到學校。: 爺爺一看到我，就請我吃西瓜，請我喝茶。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Sicedam tu nipalumaan ni vaki tu ciyak, saalesu’ sa a kaenen.
The watermelon grown by grandpa is very sweet and really delicious.
我今天七點到學校。: 爺爺種的西瓜很甜，真的很好吃。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: U maulahay:tu kaku tu ociya ni vaki, alesu’ aca a nananuman.
I also like grandpa’s tea, it’s tasted good too.
我今天七點到學校。: 我也喜歡爺爺的茶，也很好喝。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Misakalahuk kaku aci vayi aku i kalahukan.
At noon, I cooked lunch with my grandma.
我今天七點到學校。: 中午的時候，我和奶奶一起煮午餐。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Adihay ku nicacakan ni vayi tu sakalahuk, sivuting, siayam, sitamurak atu kacumuli.
Grandma cooked a big lunch, including fish, chicken, pumpkin, and snails.
我今天七點到學校。: 奶奶煮了很豐盛的午餐，有魚、有雞、有南瓜、還有蝸牛。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Herek sa namalahuk, tayra kami i padatengan a mikituc tu dateng.
After lunch, we went to the vegetable garden to pick vegetables.
我今天七點到學校。: 吃完午餐後，我們去菜園摘菜。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Adihay ku nipaahen ni vayi tu vunga, tali atu lukiyu i takuwan, u sapataluma’ nu maku saan.
Grandma brought me a lot of sweet potatoes, taro and buckwheat, and asked me to take them home.
我今天七點到學校。: 奶奶拿了很多地瓜、芋頭和蕗蕎給我，要我帶回家。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: A miliyas hen kaku tu henian, rumaaw tu aca a milisu’ i tu henian.
I said goodbye to them and said I’d see them next time.
我今天七點到學校。: 我跟他們道別，說下次再去看他們。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Hakulungen nu pasevana’ay kami anini a remiad a tayra i tunguyen, misilsil kami i panan a micakay tu paya.
Today the teacher took us to the zoo, and we lined up at the gate to buy tickets.
我今天七點到學校。: 今天老師帶我們去動物園，我們在門口排隊買票。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Cumud sa hen kami i tunguyen, suwal satu ku pasevana’ay : i aayaway u ayam, u uner ku i lalikulay, ka amu hantu ku misamelamelaway.
After entering the zoo, the teacher said, There are birds in the front and snakes in the back
我今天七點到學校。: so you can visit them yourself.""
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/34045/5: 進入動物園後，老師說:「前面是鳥類，後面是蛇類，大家自己參觀。」

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: U matalaway kaku tu uner, sisa ,caay pimelaw kaku tu uner.
I'm afraid of snakes, so I don't look at snakes.
我今天七點到學校。: 我會怕蛇，所以我不看蛇類。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Adihay ku nikamelawan nu maku tu ayam, simarevahuyay i kudul nu kilang, ira aca ku nikamelawan i vuhang nu kilang simaredavu’ay nu tuul.
I saw a lot of birds flying around in the trees and saw owls sleeping in tree hollows.
我今天七點到學校。: 我看到了很多鳥，他們在樹上飛來飛去，還有看到貓頭鷹在樹洞裡睡覺。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Ira ku tasiyang, sevayu, lukedaw, i tunguyen, nahacuwa kaku a makamelaw tu matiniay a aadupen, salipahak sa ku vulucu’ a makamelaw i anini a remiad.
There are elephants, horses and tigers in the zoo. I have never seen these animals before. I was really happy to see them today.
我今天七點到學校。: 動物園裡有大象、馬和老虎，我從前沒有看過這些動物，今天看到了真的很開心。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Adihay ku nipisasing nu maku, u sapamelaw ci amaan aci inaan.
I took a lot of pictures and showed them to my parents.
我今天七點到學校。: 我拍了很多照片，給爸爸媽媽看。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Anuruma, a mahakulung a tayni aca aci ama atu ina.
Next time I will come with my parents.
我今天七點到學校。: 下次要跟爸爸媽媽一起來。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: A tayra kaku i Taytung a milisu’ ci vikiyan aku atu kaka tu vavahiyan i tina pihivangan a remiadan.
This holiday, my sister and I went to Taitung to visit my uncle.
我今天七點到學校。: 這個假日，我和姊姊去台東拜訪叔叔。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Namaka Taypak kami a midakaw tu silamalay a tayra i Taytung.
We took the train from Taipei to Taitung.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們從台北搭火車去臺東。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Tangasatu i Taytung, parakat ci vaki tu karireng a tayni i pangiruan a militemuh i tamiyan.
When we arrived in Taitung, my uncle drove to the station to pick us up.
我今天七點到學校。: 到了台東，叔叔開車來車站接我們。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: I ngata nu pangiruan ku luma’ ni vaki, caay katenes tangasa tu i luma’.
The station is not far from my uncle’s house, and it’s just a short drive away.
我今天七點到學校。: 車站離叔叔家很近，開車一下子就到了。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Sidadahalay a pahutinan ci vaki i ngata nu luma’, mahakulungay kami a mivatikar i pahutinan.
There is a big ranch near my uncle’s house, and we rode bicycles to the ranch together.
我今天七點到學校。: 叔叔家附近有個很大的牧場，我們一起騎腳踏車到牧場。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: I pahutinan, hakulungen ni vaki kami a tayra a pahavay tu siri atu midakaw tu sevayu i pahutinan.
In the ranch, my uncle took us to feed the sheep and ride horses.
我今天七點到學校。: 在牧場，叔叔帶我們餵羊和騎馬。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: I lavii, mahakulung kami a tayra i patiyamay a malavi.
In the evening, we went to the city to have dinner together.
我今天七點到學校。: 晚上，我們一起去市區吃飯。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Adihay ku karireng i tukay, manay makaotovay kami a tayra i itila.
There are a lot of cars in the city, so we go there by motorcycle.
我今天七點到學校。: 市區車子很多，所以我們騎摩托車去那裡。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: I piliyasan niyam, araw takawen nu tau ku otovay, maanen aca, dakaw satu kami tu vasu a miliyas.
When we were about to leave, we found that the motorcycle had been stolen, so we had to leave by bus.
我今天七點到學校。: 要離開的時候，發現摩托車被偷了，我們只好搭公車離開。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Tangasatu kami anini i Taypak, matepaay tu hakiya ku otovay ni vaki ?
Now that we are back in Taipei, I don’t know if my uncle’s motorcycle has been found.
我今天七點到學校。: 現在我們回到台北了，不知道叔叔的摩托車找到了沒有。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Nanu wawa, na i Rinahem ku luma’ niyam, micudad satu, tayraen i Tawyen a malinah, i tokatokayan satu a maurip.
When we were young, our family lived in Rinahem. After I started school, we moved to Taoyuan and have been living in the city ever since.
我今天七點到學校。: 小時候我們家住在光榮部落，上學以後，就搬到了桃園市，一直在都市裡生活。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Micudad satu kaku i Tasiye, u serangawan nu Yincumin, ku nitutucan nu maku a minanam, u sakavana’ tu nikasarumaruma a serangawan nu i Taywanay a yaanay ku aru’ a vinacadan.
After I went to college, I took a course on aboriginal culture and learned that the aboriginal people in Taiwan have various and rich cultures.
我今天七點到學校。: 上了大學以後，我修了一堂關於原住民文化的課程，瞭解到臺灣原住民族有各式各樣豐富的文化。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Sisa, a taluma’ kaku atu kaka tu vavainayan i pipantangan nina mihca mangalay a milisu’ tu kalas nu niyaru’, mangalay a misapinang tu serangawan nu urip.
So this summer, my brother and I went back to our tribe to visit the elderly, hoping to understand the culture of our own ethnic group.
我今天七點到學校。: 因此，今年暑假時，我和哥哥回到部落訪問老人家，想要瞭解自己族群的文化。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Walu a pulu’ tu ku mihcaan nu matuasay, nika matiya i terungay hen ku mihcaan a melawen.
The old man is already eighty years old, but he still looks like a middle-aged man.
我今天七點到學校。: 老人家已經八十歲了，但是看起來還像中年人。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Pina saw ku nikavana’an nu misu tu suwal nu rumaan a niyaru’? mavana’ cira a semuwal tunu Ripun, nu Teruku atu nu Ngayngay.
I asked him which languages he knew, and he was fluent in Teruku, as well as Atayal, Hakka and Ngayngay.
我今天七點到學校。: 我問他會哪些語言，他的日語說得很流利，也會說太魯閣族語和客家語。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Palita han nu maku cira, araw nanu wawa mavana’tu tu suwal nu Ripun, siramud sa u vavahi nu Teruku, i nikadademak aluman ku cavay nira tu Ngayngay, namahaen hati:la satu ku kavana’an nira tu rumaan a suwal.
I asked him to find out that he learned Japanese when he was a child, his wife is an Teruku, and he knows many Hakkas at work, so he can speak so many languages.
我今天七點到學校。: 我問他才知道，原來他小時候就學日本話，太太是太魯閣族人，而他工作上認識許多客家人，所以他會說這麼多語言。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: I nipilisu’ niyam a masasuwal, adihay ku nipasevana’ ni vaki tu kakawaw tunu sakay pivutingan, piadupan a rayrayan.
During our interview, the old man talked about a lot of traditional knowledge about hunting.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們訪談的時候，老人家談論了許多關於漁獵的傳統知識。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Kanahatu caay katesek ku nikavana’an niyam tu nipisaheci ni vaki, nika, luingen niyam tu soci, hangay liyawan nu niyam a misapinang a mitengil i luma’.
Although we could’t fully understand it, we could record it on our cell phones and listen to it more.
我今天七點到學校。: 雖然我們沒有辦法完全聽懂，但是我們有用手機錄影，可以再仔細聆聽。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Yu wawa hen kami nahacuwa a mavana’ tu serangawan nu tireng, mangudu aca a kavana’an nu tau tu wawa nu Pangcah.
When I was young, I didn’t understand the culture of my ethnic group, and I was a little embarrassed that I was an aborigine.
我今天七點到學校。: 小時候我不瞭解自己族群的文化，對於自己是原住民有點不好意思。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Adihay ku nikavana’an tu serangawan nu tuas, mangalev ku nikariang a malawawa nu Pangcah, u masacidekay, u kasenengan ku vinacadan nu mita.
The more I know, the more I feel that being a ’Amis is unique and something to be proud of.
我今天七點到學校。: 瞭解愈多以後，愈覺得自己身為阿美族人，是很獨特的，也很值得驕傲。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: I sangsangdev nina remiad, a taluma’ ku sava tu vavainayan.
My younger brother is going home this evening.
我今天七點到學校。: 今天傍晚，弟弟就要回家了。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Tayra i iciva kaku aci vayi a micakay tu ayam, a micacak tu alesu’ay a sakalavi a pakaen tu vavainayan a sava.
My grandma and I went to the market to buy chickens and prepared a delicious dinner for my younger brother.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和奶奶去市場買雞，準備煮好吃的晚餐給弟弟。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Mitaeliv kami tu pacakayay tu dateng, adihay ku luengelay a dateng i nipatadaan.
We passed the vegetable stand, which had a lot of fresh green vegetables.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們經過了菜攤，他擺放了好多新鮮的青菜。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Sinicakay kami tu incay, kuletu atu nincing.
We bought water spinach, yams and carrots.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們買了空心菜、山藥和胡蘿蔔。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Ira i teparay a pacakayay tu lusay a tawki suwal saan : “U nipacakayan nu maku tu paringad atu rupas sicedamay yo! picakayi saw atudi!”
The owner of the nearby fruit stand said: “My pineapples and peaches are very sweet. Buy some!”
我今天七點到學校。: 旁邊水果攤的老闆說:「我的鳳梨和桃子很甜。買一些吧!」

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Cakay satu kami tu paringad atu rupas.
We bought pineapples and peaches.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們買了鳳梨和桃子。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Mitaeliv kami tu pacakayay tu titi, suwal sa kira tawki: A u maan saw ku cakayen nu misu? tataang siheci aca kina ayam anini, tulu a patekenan ku cacayay.
We passed the meat stall, and the boss said, “What do you want to buy? Today’s chickens are big and fat, and one is 300 NTD.”
我今天七點到學校。: 我們經過了肉攤，老闆說:「你要買什麼?今天的雞又大又肥，一隻300元。」

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Matekesen ci vayi, keluli saw atudi saan a mipalita tira tawkian.
Grandma thought it was too expensive and asked the boss if it could be cheaper.
我今天七點到學校。: 奶奶覺得太貴了，問老闆可不可以便宜一點。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Caay tu katekes isaw saan kira tawki, awaay tu ku kakelulan.
But the boss said that it is already very cheap and cannot be reduced any further.
我今天七點到學校。: 但老闆說已經很便宜，不能再減了。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Katayni i takuwan a micakay tu vuting, saan kira i teparay a tawki, caay katekes, tataak aca ku vuting nu maku saan a semuwal.
The boss next door said, come and buy my fish, my fish is big and cheap.
我今天七點到學校。: 隔壁的老闆說，來買我的魚，我的魚又大又便宜。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Herek saan kami a micakay tu ayam atu vuting, taluma’ satu cacay a sapadan ku nipatada tu nicacakan tu sinavelan.
In the end we bought chicken and fish, and went home to cook a table of food.
我今天七點到學校。: 最後我們買了雞也買了魚，回家煮了一桌子的菜。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Matenes ku nipitala, araw tueman tu ku remiad.
After waiting for a long time, it was already dark.
我今天七點到學校。: 等了好久，天已經黑了。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Patelay ku sava tu vavainayan, sikavahalan nu kuntay a caay aca pihivang saan, a pakucila tu lalipayan kiya a taluma’ isaw.
The younger brother called back and said that the army suddenly couldn’t take a vacation and would not be back until the next Sunday.
我今天七點到學校。: 弟弟打電話回來說，軍隊突然不能放假了，要下一個禮拜日才回來。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Suwal sa ci vayi adihay ku nicacakan, katien ku alumanay a patayni a kemaen.
Grandma said that she has cooked so much, so let’s eat together!
我今天七點到學校。: 奶奶說已經煮了這麼多，叫大家一起來吃吧!

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Aluman ku nitakusan niyam tu cavay, kumuday nu mita a miseka tu nisakalavian.
We invited friends and family to have a great dinner together.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們邀請了親朋好友，一起來享用豐盛的晚餐。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Ira ku kapaut nu maku ci Kacaw han ku ngangan, hinapawapawan a mikerit ku lalusidan nira.
I have a classmate named Kacaw, he often forgets to bring things.
我今天七點到學校。: 我有一個同學叫Kacaw，他常常忘記帶東西。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: I nipicudad satu, micaliw cira tu sapisurit, savuric ansa u sasasuritan tu teparay a kaputan.
During class, he borrowed pencils, erasers or notebooks from his classmates.
我今天七點到學校。: 上課的時候，他跟同學借鉛筆、橡皮擦或是筆記本。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Kinacacay, kinatusa, kinatulu, pacaliwantu nu alumanay tu maan i ciraan.
Once, twice, three times, everyone would lend him something.
我今天七點到學校。: 一次、兩次、三次，大家會借東西給他。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Nika, siraecusay a wayway cira, namicaliw tu lalusidan caay tu panukas tu nicaliwan.
But he has a bad habit of often borrowing things but not returning them.
我今天七點到學校。: 但是他有個壞習慣，經常借了東西卻不還。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Tunamahaen, awaay tu ku pacaliway nu alumanay tu lalusidan nu heni i ciraan.
In the end, no one wanted to borrow anything from him.
我今天七點到學校。: 最後大家都不想借他東西了。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Cacay a remiad, mahekulung kami u alumanay a tayra i umaumahan a mihulul.
One day, we all went on an outing together.
我今天七點到學校。: 有一天，我們大家一起去郊遊。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: I vatad nu lalan, alenih ci Kacaw, nika mapawan cira tu sailus a tatipeluk.
On the way, Kacaw wanted to go to the bathroom, but he forgot to bring toilet paper.
我今天七點到學校。: 路途中，Kacaw想上廁所，但他忘記帶衛生紙。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Micaliw cira tu sailus i kaput. Nika, awaay ku nikerida niyam saan a pacauv i ciraan.
He borrowed toilet paper from his classmates, but everyone told him that I didn't bring them either.
我今天七點到學校。: 他跟同學借衛生紙，可是大家都回他說，我也沒有帶耶。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Taletangictu ci Kacaw a makatengil, macalivat a semuwal cira, kiya caay saw pacaliw tu sailus i takuwan saan.
Kacaw burst into tears. He said angrily, why don't everyone lend me toilet paper!
我今天七點到學校。: Kacaw急的哭了出來。他生氣的說，為什麼大家都不借我衛生紙!!

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Pacauv han tu nu kaput cira, caay kisu pikerid tu nu tirengay a lausidan kiyami? Iri, nipicaliwan a lalusidan i tisuwan nahacuwa saw kisu a panukas!
The classmate told him, because you didn't bring it yourself, and you wouldn't return the things lent to you!
我今天七點到學校。: 同學告訴他，因為你都不自己帶，而且借給你的東西，你都不會還!

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Pakucila a micudad, maratar ci Kacaw a i cacudadan, panukasen ni Kacaw amin ku nicaliwan tu kaput.
The next day at school, Kacaw arrived at school early and returned everything he had borrowed from his classmates.
我今天七點到學校。: 隔天上學，Kacaw很早就到學校了，Kacaw把跟同學借的東西都還給同學們。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Sululen kaku saan ci Kacaw tu kaput nira, a mikerid tu kaku tu lausidan nu tireng i nalikulan saan, a miaray aca tu nikangaay nu kaput a pacaliw i ciraan.
kacaw apologized to the students and said that he would definitely bring his own things in the future, and thanked the classmates for their willingness to lend him things before.
我今天七點到學校。: kacaw向同學們道歉，並說他以後一定會自己帶東西，也謝謝同學們之前願意借他東西。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: U miadupay nu niyaru’ ku ama nu maku.
My dad is a hunter of the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的爸爸是部落的獵人。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Yu wawa hen kaku, yu tahekal ci ama aci vaki, sinirepet tu hawan atu kuwang ku heni.
When I was little, my dad and uncle would go out at night with hunting knives and guns.
我今天七點到學校。: 我小的時候，爸爸和叔叔會在晚上出門，帶著獵刀和獵槍。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Tangelal sa hen ku remiad, siniawit tu tama’ ku heni a taluma’.
At daybreak, they returned with their prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 天亮時，他們就會帶著獵到的獵物回來。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Yu ruma sa u vavuy nu lutuk, yu ruma sa u rapic, alamaanan ira ku tuluk.
Sometimes it was a boar, sometimes a flying squirrel, and occasionally a pheasant.
我今天七點到學校。: 有時候是山豬、有時候是飛鼠，偶爾也會有雉雞。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: I luma’ ku heni a mikilac tu tama’ tu sapavatis tu laluma’an.
They would divide the prey at the entrance of the village and share it with the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 他們會在家裡把獵物分好，分享給族人。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Miucil kaku ci amaan, mangalay a mihakulung ci amaan a miadup.
Every time I quarreled with my father, I wanted to go hunting with my father.
我今天七點到學校。: 我每次都會吵著爸爸，要跟著爸爸去打獵。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Itiyaaw tu a mihakulung anu matuas tu kisu saan ci ama.
Dad said that he would take me with me when I grew up.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸說等我長大了他再帶我一起去。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: U teker ku sapiadup nu vavainay, mavana’ ku heni a misanga’ tu talakal, tu erid atu taerev.
The men of the tribe also trap their prey, making lasso traps and rock traps.
我今天七點到學校。: 男人會用陷阱抓獵物，他們會製作套索陷阱和石壓式陷阱。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Mavana’ ci ama aku a misateker, u sapiteker tu tuluk ku matuniay saan, a sameteken nu mita a mimelaw ku narakatan nu aadupen, sulinay pacunek han i narakatan nu aadupen a pateli.
My dad is very good at making lasso traps. Dad said that this is used to catch pheasants. We have to carefully observe the footprints of the prey, and the traps should be placed on the path of the prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的爸爸很會製作套索陷阱，爸爸說，這是用來捕抓雉雞的，我們要仔細觀察獵物的腳印，陷阱要放在獵物走的路上。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Makalah kaku a matuas saan, kiya a hakulungen nu matuasay a miadup, saremiad satu kaku a minanam a misanga’ tu tatekeran, sulinay, sinikalepelan tu aadupen ku nisanga’an nu maku a teker.
In order to go hunting with adults as soon as possible, I practiced making traps every day, and soon my traps can really catch prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 為了可以趕快和大人一起去打獵，我每天練習製作陷阱，很快地我的陷阱就真的可以抓到獵物了。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Melaw sa ci ama i takuwan, Suwal sa : A u tatadaanay a miadupay kisu i rumaan a remiad.
Dad saw it and told me that I will be a very good hunter in the future.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸看到後對我說我以後一定會是很厲害的獵人。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Matuas tu kaku anini, caelayen nu maku ku pana’ a mihakulung ci amaan a tayra a miadup.
Now that I have grown up, I carry my bow and arrows and go hunting with my father.
我今天七點到學校。: 現在我長大了，我背起我的弓和箭矢，跟著爸爸一起去打獵。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Taluma’ sa i niyaru’ kilacen niyam ku tama’ a pavatis tu laluma’an.
When returning to the village, share the hunted prey with the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 回村時將獵到的獵物切割和族人們分享。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Suwal sa ci ama, “A mivetik kita tu nipalemed nu kawas tu nikarahid nu mita a ira ku sakataluma’ a tama’.”
Dad said, we want to thank the ancestors for their blessings, so that we have a lot of prey to harvest.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸說，我們要感謝祖靈賜福，讓我們有很多獵物收穫。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Namautang kaku a talacacudadan i nadavak.
I was late for school this morning.
我今天七點到學校。: 我早上上學遲到了。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Mapawan kaku a sikavang, natala i cacudadan.
When I was going to school, I forgot to bring my backpack.
我今天七點到學校。: 去學校的時候，我忘了帶書包。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Awaawa ku nikerid nu maku tu maamaan.
I didn’t bring anything with me.
我今天七點到學校。: 我什麼東西都沒有帶。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: I namicudad, mahkulung kaku atu kaput a mimelaw tu cudad.
During class, I and my classmates read the textbook together.
我今天七點到學校。: 上課的時候，我和同學一起看課本。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: I pisekingan, pacaliwan nu kaput kaku tu sapisurit atu savuric.
During the exam, a classmate lent me a pen and an eraser.
我今天七點到學校。: 考試的時候，同學借我筆和橡皮擦。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Pasuwal satu ku pasevan’ay itakuwan, “akaa tu kautang, karatar tu a lumuwad haw!”
The teacher told me, “Wake up earlier next time and don’t be late again!”
我今天七點到學校。: 老師跟我說：「不要再遲到了，下次早點起床!」

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: U sakapahay nu maku a cavay ci Kacaw, u wawa: nu Pangcah cira.
My good friend’s name is Kacaw, and he is also an Amis child.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的好朋友叫Kacaw，他也是阿美族的小孩。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Malecavayay kami a micadad i Rinahem.
We study together in the Rinahem tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們一起在光榮部落讀書。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Mahkulungay tu kami a mitengil tu nipakungku nu kalas, u mavana’:ay kami a misanuPangcah.
We often listen to the elders telling stories together, and we both can speak the Amis proficiently.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們常常一起聽耆老說故事，我們都很會說阿美語。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Tarakaw, masusu aca kaku, puener, makupit aca ci Kacaw.
I am tall and overweight, while Kacaw is short and thin.
我今天七點到學校。: 我很高也很胖，Kacaw很矮也很瘦。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: U masakapahay ci Kacaw, manay, aluman ku maulahay i ciraan.
Kacaw is very energetic, and everyone likes him a lot.
我今天七點到學校。: Kacaw很有活力，大家都很喜歡他。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Miundukay ku cacudadan anini, manay adihay ku nikacacavi i cacudadan.
Today was the school's sports day, and the school organized many competitions.
我今天七點到學校。: 今天是學校的運動會，學校舉辦了許多競賽。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Ira ku mamaviyangaay, mimaliay, mavakacay, misakeruay, mipana’ay.
There were tug of war, soccer, running, dancing, and archery.
我今天七點到學校。: 有拔河的、打球的、跑步的、跳舞的和射箭的。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Madademec kaku a mavakec.
I participated in the running competition.
我今天七點到學校。: 我比賽跑步。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Namatulu’ kaku namavekac, tanu remes satu ku tusur nu maku.
When I was running, I fell down, and my knees were bleeding.
我今天七點到學校。: 當我跑步的時候，我跌倒了，膝蓋流了很多血。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Nika, lumuwad kaku, a taleayaw aca a mavekac.
But I stood up and continued running forward.
我今天七點到學校。: 但我站起來，繼續向前跑。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Tanu lipahak satu ku alumanay tu nikatangsa nu maku.
Everyone was happy when I reached the finish line.
我今天七點到學校。: 我到終點時所有人都很開心。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Kanahatu caay kaw saayaway kaku, nika lipahak kaku, namaherekay tu kaku namadademec kiyami.
Although I didn't get first place, I'm glad because I completed the race.
我今天七點到學校。: 雖然沒有獲得第一名，但我很高興，因為我完成了比賽。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Namahkulung kaku aci ama nu maku a milisu’ ci ama ci Kacaw i nacila.
Yesterday, my father and I visited my uncle.
我今天七點到學校。: 昨天我和爸爸去拜訪我的叔叔Kacaw。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Madukaay ku kuku’ ni ama ni Kacaw.
My uncle injured his foot.
我今天七點到學校。: Kacaw叔叔的腳受傷了。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Mavuhang ku vadahung nu luma’ saan cira i tamiyan.
He told us that there was a hole in the roof of his house.
我今天七點到學校。: 他告訴我們，房子的屋頂破了一個洞。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Matevaday cira namakayra i vadahung, namisanga’ tu vadahung saan.
He fell off the roof while repairing it.
我今天七點到學校。: 他在修理屋頂時，從屋頂摔下來了。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Siniawit ci ama tu titi nu rarapa atu icep, u sapaveli i ci ama ci Kacaw.
My father brought beef and betel nuts for my uncle.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸帶了牛肉和檳榔給Kacaw叔叔。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Natayra i luma’ ni ama ni Kacaw kaku i nacila, adihay ku nipakungku nira.
My uncle and I chatted in the room, and he shared many stories.
我今天七點到學校。: 我昨天去Kacaw叔叔家聊天時 ，他分享了很多故事。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Kaw rarutu kaku, suwal satu ci ama ci Kacaw itakuwan, mavatac tu kisu, tanestes tu kisu saan.
Before I left, my uncle praised me for growing taller and becoming more handsome.
我今天七點到學校。: 我要離開前，Kacaw叔叔誇我長高了，也變得更帥氣了。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Anu kapah tu ku kuku’ nu misu, tayni han tu i luma’ a mihulul han aku ci ama ci Kacaw.
I said, When your foot gets better
我今天七點到學校。: come to our house next time and visit us.""
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/34045/5: 於是我說：「等Kacaw叔叔腳好了，下次也來我們家玩。」

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: I 2022 a mihcaan, namiluvang ku ceng-fu tu madengay a cacayen ku nipangangan tu ngangan nu Yincumin i muvinsiw.
In 2022, the government announced that indigenous identification cards can include tribal names separately.
我今天七點到學校。: 在2022年，政府召開了原住民身分證可單列族名會議。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Namipalita kaku ci kulas Vutingan tu matenesay a madademec tu ceng-fu a sacacayen ku sakasingangan i muvinsiw nu Yincumin.
I interviewed Noami Kulas, a young tribal member who has long been advocating for the inclusion of tribal names on identification cards.
我今天七點到學校。: 我訪問了長期向政府爭取身分證「單列族名」的部落青年Kulas Vuting。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: A malitemuh kami i pihivangan, a tayra i luma’ nira a mipalita i ciraan.
We had arranged to visit his home this holiday for the interview.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和他約定好這個假日到他家訪問他。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Namipalita kaku i ciraan, pasuwal sa tu nikasingangan nira, pasasuaraw aca i takuwan tu lalavu’ nu luma’ atu niyaru’ nira.
During the interview, he introduced to me the origin of his name and also introduced me to his family and tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 在訪問的過程中，他向我介紹了他的名字的由來，也帶我認識了他的家人、他的部落。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Palita han aku cira, kiya mangalay a misumad tu ngangan, u nihaenan tu a nipangangan i, caay haw kakapah?
I asked him why he insisted on changing his name. Wasn’t the old registration method sufficient?
我今天七點到學校。: 我問他為什麼堅持要改名，舊的登記方式不好嗎?

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Suwal satu itakuwan, u nisuritan a ngangan tu nu Hulam, caay kasipinang tu tadangangan nira, u ruma satu ira ku mitadihangaay i ciraan tu Ku-syen-sen saan, manay, u sasakemutan nu tau.
He told me that using Chinese characters could not accurately convey his name, and others would still call him \Ku Xian Sheng
我今天七點到學校。: \" which resulted in many jokes being made."
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/34045/5: 他對我說，因為用中文字並不能準確的傳達他的名字，其他人還會叫他「古先生」，也因此鬧出不少笑話。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Suwal satu ci Kulas Vuting “u surit nu Yincumin ku tadangangan nu mita. U ngasaw nu mita, u lalavu’ nu luma’ nu mita, u nu urip tu nu mita, ngay alumanaluman tu ku singanganay tu ngangan nu urip.”
Kulas Vuting said, \The names written in indigenous languages are our true names. My name represents our ethnic group
我今天七點到學校。: our family
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/34045/5: our identity. I hope more fellow tribespeople can reclaim their own names.\""
column5: Kulas Vuting 說：「原住民語書寫的名字才是我們真正的名字。我的名字代表了我們的族群、我們的家族、我們的身分，希望能有更多族人找回自己的名字。」

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Namihkulung aku aci vayian talaiciva inacila, adihay ku nialaan nira tu nipalumaan a dateng, ira aca ku nicacakan tu alesu’ay a kakaenan nu Yincumin a sapasisi tu alumanay.
Yesterday, I went to the market with my grandmother to set up a stall. My grandmother brought a lot of vegetables that she grew herself and also prepared indigenous cuisine for everyone.
我今天七點到學校。: 昨天我跟奶奶去市集擺攤，奶奶帶了許多自己種的蔬菜去，也製作了原住民美食分享給大家。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Maulah ku alumanay tu papacakayan ni vayi, sisa, aluman ku micakayay tu cupel atu adeci, maulah aca mitanam tu nisasinavelan nira.
Everyone loved my grandmother’s stall. Many people bought the chilis and African eggplants, and many people came to taste the dishes she cooked.
我今天七點到學校。: 大家很喜歡奶奶的攤位，辣椒和箭筍很多人買，許多人來品嘗她煮的菜餚。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Alesu’ kiyami ku nisakavi’an nira tu nu vataan atu hakhak, ira aca ku nipalamlaman tu siraw a kavi nu adeci, sisa, makasanek tu ku lavang a masasilsil a tayni a micakay.
The ferns and sticky rice she cooked were delicious, as well as the braised pork with maqaw pepper and wild boar meat. The flavors attracted many customers, and everyone lined up at our stall.
我今天七點到學校。: 她煮的樹豆湯和糯米飯非常好吃，還有用醃豬肉煮的箭筍湯，味道吸引了很多客人排隊來買。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Anu misacacak tu ci vayi, i tepar tu kaku a miangang tu lavang. Kalamkamen a tayni a micakay tu nipalumaan nu niyam tu tadadateng nu Pangcah han aku ku micakayay.
While my grandmother was cooking, I was on the side attracting customers. I shouted, \The vegetables are self-grown
我今天七點到學校。: all-natural and organic! Come and buy now!\""
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/34045/5: 奶奶煮東西的時候，我在旁邊招攬客人。我在一旁大喊著：「蔬菜都是自己種的，天然有機，趕快來買喔!」

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: A mamin tu ku sapacakay nu niyam, suwal satu ci vayi, “iraay kisu itini a mipadang kiyami.”
Our goods sold out quickly, and my grandmother said, \It’s all thanks to your help.\""
我今天七點到學校。: 我們的東西很快就賣完了，奶奶說：「都是因為有你的幫忙。」

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: Pakayni i tina kaludemakan a mavana’ kaku tu kavana’an tu pinalengaw, kakaenen nu Yincunmin, pasu, u ngeru’ nu pacakayay.
Through this event, I learned about indigenous plants and food and experienced the hard work of running a stall.
我今天七點到學校。: 這個活動，我學到了有關原住民植物和食品的知識，並且體驗到了擺攤的辛苦。

I pituay ku tuki tayra tu kaku i cacudad: U mahemekay, u malemeday kaku namakamelaw tu nikavana’an ni vayi a misacacak tu kakaenen nu Pangcah.
Seeing my grandmother’s passion for traditional food, I feel very proud and honored.
我今天七點到學校。: 看到了奶奶對阿美族傳統食物的熱愛，我感到非常驕傲和榮幸。
